mapper.select: SELECT pc.memberOID,pc.nameCN AS realName, cci.biddingContent AS loanuse, cci.sex AS gender, cci.age, cci.certificatesid AS idCard, cci.phone AS mobile, cci.education AS highesteduback, cci.domicile AS hkszd, cci.annualSalary AS grysr FROM WEBP2P_CarLoanCenterInfo cci, PAY_Customer pc WHERE cci.LoanNumber = #{LoanNum} AND cci.phone = pc.name
